full_summary:
### Standing Offer for Fresh Fruits and Vegetables
#### Request for Standing Offer
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence, Correctional Service of Canada, and Fisheries and Oceans Canada, invites bidders to submit a response to this request for standing offer for the procurement of fresh fruits and vegetables.

**Contract Details**
| **Section** | **Details** |
| --- | --- |
| **Title** | E6MON-24PQFL_P01-RMSO Fresh Fruits and Vegetables |
| **Reference Number** | WS4556634926-Doc4567336316 |
| **Amendment Number** | 3 |
| **Tender Closing Date** |  **2024-06-06T14:00:00** (2:00 PM EST) |

**Supply Requirements**
The contractor will be responsible for the procurement, storage, and delivery of fresh fruits and vegetables located in Quebec. 

**Trade Agreements**
This tender is aligned with the following trade agreements:
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Contact Information**
For clarification and submission of proposals, contact:

* Mr. Adjakly Efoé (SPAC/PSPC): efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Source**
Note:
The response to this tender will be available on the following website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19609809?extsite=MTk2MDk4MDlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: The tender is closed. 60 days may be granted for any questions that arise after the closing date.
---
